reviews.review_msg: Really good prof. Very enthusiastic about the topic. Always available to help. Tons of work in assignments.
Great Prof., very smart, very helpful, I recommend taking his graduate course on multimedia networking...
WOW! The Best Professor in Graduate Level. I hope there were more professors like him.
very funny professor. makes lots of jokes and eases students into the course. knows the stuff to absolute precision. great guy.

Just a super amazing Prof. So helpful and kind. If anyone out there likes to work with color images with a World re-known Prof, Dr. Drew is the guy. Not only will he guide you to do great, state of the art research, but also he will hook you up with endless top industry professionals (if this is your thing). SUPERB!

Just like a comment on 882 below this course was ridiculous. 30% of it he repeated stuff from the machine learning course from an other professor, 70% simply used free resource available online and let students to learn them on their own! Can't even correct mistakes made by students . Had difficulty calculating derivatives of one-variable function.

He is one of the best teachers I had in this school. In order to convey the meaning of the concepts he teaches, he uses both intuition and technical explanations. He enriches the content of his course with demos and videos, which I found very helpful. He has a talent of making abstract or difficult concepts look simple and easy to understand.
